itunes:author: iBooks
title: John Hodgman: Meet the Author
itunes:subtitle: The humorist and Daily Show correspondent discusses his second book.
itunes:summary: John Hodgman stopped by the Apple Store SoHo to talk about his book, "More Information Than You Require." He reads, and then discusses the book and its origins with Eat, Pray, Love author Elizabeth Gilbert.
itunes:keywords: John Hodgman, Elizabeth Gilbert, the daily show, meet the author, apple store, apple store events, authors, books
